meanings.definition: A person who strongly opposes change or refuses to give up on something.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather is a diehard when it comes to using his old flip phone.
meanings.sent2: The diehard refused to switch to a new computer system at work.
meanings.sent3: The diehard gardener refused to plant any new flowers in her garden.
meanings.sent4: She's a diehard when it comes to her favorite TV show, never missing an episode.
meanings.sent5: The diehard fan camped out for days to get tickets to the concert.

meanings.definition: Stubbornly resistant to change or unwavering in belief.
meanings.sent1: The diehard fan wore his team's jersey to every game.
meanings.sent2: She's a diehard supporter of traditional values.
meanings.sent3: The diehard cat refused to try any new brand of food.
meanings.sent4: His diehard loyalty to the company never wavered, even during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The diehard hiker never gave up, reaching the summit despite the storm.
